If League of Legends fanbase had a child to excrete itself into pieces, it would be Dead by Daylight.
The amount of selfish toxicity and putrid amounts lacking care from development team to this day and forth. Rushed content and no respect from anywhere than the 0.1% of players who actually give a damn and want this game to be better or in general have brains with sympathy.

My advice to you if you are uncertain to buy this or not: Game is only fun if you play "Kill your friends" gamemode where friends are [i] only [/i] involved. The rest of the gamemodes are history to be compared of playing chess with sub-normal dialects that will give you worst experience. Since this "game" if you would even consider calling one... doesn't have the most friendliest start for new players out there at all.

If you really give a damn to have some justice to be done, bomb a negative review on this game. It's utmost surprising that this game is at its peak breathing but like a dead horse attached next to a cardiac monitor. Otherwise if you are very weak on handling nerves, do not buy this game and ignore.

god game

Excelente juego para jugar en solitario y aún más con amigos. Recomiendo jugarlo como superviviente con 3 amigos más ya que es especialmente divertido jugarlo en cooperativo y de manera estratégica. Si estás solo, recomiendo jugarlo como asesino. Al principio, es difícil adaptarse a las habilidades del personaje pero después de unas cuentas partidas sabrás manejarlo. Hasta le coges el gusto a ser un psicópata que cuelga a sus victimas de ganchos y los sacrifica al Ente, así que advierto que puede llegar a ser muy adictivo y entretenido. A pesar de que las partidas siempre consisten en lo mismo, que es arreglar los generadores en diferentes mapas para abrir las puertas y escapar del malvado, el juego a través de sus diferentes recursos, tiene la habilidad de que nunca te llegue a resultar repetitivo y aburrido.

Where should i start?

I sank a good amount of time playing the game, learning its mechs (Not too difficult).
I mostly played killers because i found the survivor side ultimately bland, boring, without any flavour besides running, clicking and timing a few checks on repairs, no real thrill besides the musics during chases making you fear a bit as it get more intense as the killer closing in.

On the otherhand i enjoyed playing killer because i enjoyed the hunt, it came with the adrenaline i sought for catching the victims but ultimately after many changes over the years this worn off, making games short, un appealing, frustrating for killers. I find no joy anymore playing the game because i feel like they just complete ruined it by making it competative rather than a survival horror game.

You as a killer no longer a boogeyman, but a mere clown to be poked at by survivors to be laughed at and mocked, no fear factor or powerrole, you are a joke as a killer unless you play "Meta" killers just to be "Competative" because apparently playing anything other than that you will have no success to achieve anything major. 

This game was never about winning, but the thrill of chasing and seeing the survivors reaction as they attempt to run away while i slowly getting to them one by one. I just don't feel that anymore, the magic is no longer exist what was once a driving motive for me to play the game.

They improved the models, textures, add new addons/characters/killers but it changes nothing for me. Survivors still bland one click chars with barely any thrill being chased if you know what to do. Killers are still in bad shape being laughed at if you pick "Lower tier" killers or "Non" meta killers.

Game turned out to be a joke what was once an enjoyable horror game for me to get my adrenaline off.
If i could i would refund this with all its dlcs i purchased.

I guess after 600 hours in the game I'd better review it huh?

When I first got this game, I thought I would hate it. I really really dislike anything horror related so I didn't think it would be my thing, but boy was I wrong. There's been plenty of dissapointment from BHVR in the past with this game, and times they've completly messed up perks/aspects of the game. 

Overall, I love Dead By Daylight, and I'll keep playing it for the forseable, but the most annoying thing is the MMR. You get put against killers who are way better than you, or a survivor is matched with a killer who is really low. The worst I've had was my whole team who were bronze or below against an irri 1 killer.  

I'd reccomend it because it's fun to play with friends!
